verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Begin the day with God! He is thy sun and day; His is the radiance of thy dawn, To Him commit thy way.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Sing a new song at morn! Join the glad woods and hills; Join the fresh winds and seas and plains, Join the bright flowers and rills.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Sing thy first song to God Not to thy fellow man; Not to the creatures of His hand, But to the glorious One.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Take thy first walk with God! Let Him go forth with thee; By stream or sea or mountain path, Seek still His company.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Thy first transaction be With God Himself above; So shall thy business prosper well, And all the day be love.
